version_description:
1. 新增手機票證分票功能，單筆訂位紀錄預訂多張全票時，可透過手機分票功能將票證分送同行者使用。
2. 其他程式邏輯調整。

1. New"ticket collection and distribution"function. When booking multiple full fare tickets under one record, you can distribute the tickets to your friends through the cell phone ticket distribution function.
2. Other minor adjustment to improve system performance.

其他程式邏輯調整及系統效能優化。

minor adjustment to improve system performance.

其他程式邏輯調整及系統效能優化。

minor adjustment to improve system performance.

新增訊息推播功能.
New "Push Notification" function.

1.部分功能調整。
2.系統效能優化。

1. Fine-tuning of mobile app.
2. Improved performance.

1. 新增大學生優惠車票預購服務
2. 新增商務車廂座位選位功能
3. 程式修復或調整

1. Tickets for college students can be booked.
2. Business Car Seats Modification Service.
3. Some bug fixes.

其他程式邏輯調整及系統效能優化。
minor adjustment to improve system performance.

解決部分信用卡無法付款問題。

Solved payment crush.

解決部分iOS版本無法正常顯示T Express手機票證問題。

Fixed mobile ticket of T Express can't be displayed problem.

1.新增以「起訖站/發車日期/車次」查詢訂位紀錄功能
2.新增購票證明單下載功能
3.支援台灣行動支付t wallet付款功能
4.其他程式邏輯調整

1.New reservation inquiry function.
2.Added with purchase certificate downloaded function.
3.Support “t wallet”App for payment.
4.Other minor adjustment to improve system performance.

其他程式邏輯調整.

Other minor adjustment to improve system performance.

其他程式邏輯調整.

Other minor adjustment to improve system performance.

支援高鐵個人會員機制.

THSRC personal member service support.

支援Apple pay付款功能。

Support Apple Pay for payment.

更新注意事項內容與介面文字調整。

Update the rules content and UI wording.

修正iOS11.3版本無法透過一般信用卡付款問題.

Fix the problem with payment via credit card on T Express in iOS 11.3.

程式優化。

Minor adjustment to improve user experience.

程式優化

Minor adjustment to improve user experience.

1.「編輯」功能中之「刪除行程」調整至「退票」功能選項中，並優化去回票退票功能。
2.「擷取紀錄」、「便利商店付款」等功能介面優化。
3.程式優化。

We update the T-EX app to make it more reliable for you. Here are some enhancements you’ll find in the latest update:
1.Easily cancel half of your unused round-trip ticket within the “Refund” function
2.Optimize the features and UI of “Download” & “Convenience Store Payment”
Thanks for using T-EX & have a pleasant journey!

程式優化。
The latest version contains some adjustments to improve user experience. Thanks for using T Express!

1.新增信用卡優惠購票機制。
2.【個人資料設定】新增TGo帳號【訂票預設】選項，可設定於訂票流程中直接帶入。
3.注意事項內文調整。
4.功能介面優化。
5.支援銀聯信用卡Apple Pay交易(適用iOS 11.3(含)以上之作業系統)。

We have new features and improvements!
-The AutoFill function in “User Information” allows passengers to save their TGo accounts and auto complete “Contact Information” form for passengers while they’re booking tickets.
-China UnionPay cards are accepted for Apple Pay payment on T Express in iOS 11.3 or later.
These updates will be rolling out on version 4.60 of the app.

程式優化。

Minor adjustment to improve user experience.

1. 全新介面設計，優化使用體驗！
2. 新增即時列車運轉資訊
3. 優化VoiceOver無障礙輔助功能
